title: Alphakilo
author: Alphakilo
content: Can we ever have these again in 2023?Going to back to the first days of bitcoin it was easy and cheap to get 5 bitcoins for free by just solving a simple task. This bitcoin core developer, chief scientist on the forum, Gavin Andresen in June 11, 2010, created this web site https://freebitcoins.appspot.com/  that gives away Bitcoins. There were about ฿1,100  He wanted bitcoin to succeed. He wanted to see more people adopt bitcoin. How proud he would be right now knowing that bitcoin is succeeding and progressing. 5 bitcoins today at the price of $26797 per bitcoin is worth - $133,985 The website doesn't work anymore. The it will forever be remembered. Here is the OP where he announced it on the forum - https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=183.msg1488#msg1488Do we still have legit websites like this today that gives out free bitcoins?

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: Quote from: Alphakilo on June 20, 2023, 06:49:07 AMDo we still have legit websites like this today that gives out free bitcoins?The one that I know is still existing is Freebitco.io, but it is more than a faucet, it is more of a gambling site. The bitcoin reward is very small. When I checked it in 2021, it was 0.00000007 BTC per hour, which is absolutely a waste of time. Others that I have seen before are like freebitco. Faucets are waste of time now.

comments.author: Faisal2202
comments.body: Quote from: Alphakilo on June 20, 2023, 06:49:07 AMCan we ever have these again in 2023?No, we can not ever see these opportunities again, not even in 2023 and not even in any future timeframe, Because, it was a one-and-only opportunity from which many have benefited a lot and many just get their hands off from BTC, and there come legends like Gavin Andresen and Laszlo (pizza guy) who have sacrificed big amounts of BTC just to streamline its adoption. I hope they will not regret there decisions.Quote from: Alphakilo on June 20, 2023, 06:49:07 AMDo we still have legit websites like this today that gives out free bitcoins?Yes, we do have many websites giving bitcoins but not free, we have to perform some tasks and believe me, once you start to perform some survey tasks on Free BTC Faucets, you will disappear in the streets of tasks, and will never complete more than 2 survey tasks, but all you can do is claim free BTC after every 30 minutes or 1 hour (depends on the project schemes) and after 24 hours. But you are not going to be rich even if it would be hard to make a living on these websites.

comments.author: BD Crypto
comments.body: Quote from: Alphakilo on June 20, 2023, 06:49:07 AMDo we still have legit websites like this today that gives out free bitcoins?You are talking about old crypto faucets which paid a lot of Bitcoins for just solving captcha. Then the price of Bitcoin was very very low and people was newly knowing about it. So faucets paid a good amount for every claim which is much worthy in current price. So now it's impossible to earn any big amount from faucets. Even I think it's just waste of time now a days. Anyway there are also running some crypto faucets but thay are paying just a few Satoshi's . One of the most popular faucet is https://freebitco.in/You can play gambling also in it.Anyway now I will not suggest anyone to work in faucets and waste your time. There is a lot of alternative works which may generate you more funds than any faucets.

comments.author: Crypt0Gore
comments.body: Yeah freebitco still gives free Bitcoin till today and it's more like a faucet but you need to claim every hour, the amount giving out today is extremely low and it will take a long time before you reach your withdrawal limit, thinks have changed and time have passed, Bitcoin is now the big daddy of amazing value, no one dares give it up easily.But OP, why do you feel the need to recreate this topic again? It makes no sense if someone has already done it before, this is not those news that need to be share few times on the forum to warn people about some hacks that's ongoing so as to reach many people in a short time. It makes no sense to create this again.

comments.body: Quote from: Alphakilo on June 20, 2023, 06:49:07 AMDo we still have legit websites like this today that gives out free bitcoins?Yes but not as what you think with the one that Gavin made and did. Currently, you have to mine, buy or earn your bitcoin. I have not seen anywhere where they are giving people free gold even in Gold Coast (Ghana) where gold is mined in large quantities. So don't expect to get bitcoin cheaply like in those good old days. Getting free BTC faucets is time time-consuming and the price is not encouraging. Don't also be in haste to join any platform or website where they have promised to give out free bitcoin. Most scammers use this mouthwatering offer to swindle unexpected investors. Many people have been scammed or their accounts hacked because they trusted these scam sites that offer free Bitcoin. I have read the thread by Gavin Andresen and I have always wished I was part of the people that benefited from his liberality. These are bitcoin legends that sacrificed and invested so much to make the bitcoin project a success. But I doubt  if I would be able hodl my coins to date because I might have sold them just like many impatient people did.

comments.author: Texac
comments.body: what you are talking about are faucets, they usually offer free bitcoins.  as far as I know, there are still some faucets that are still working, but given the expensive value of bitcoin, the amount of bitcoin you get from faucets today is too little.  Joining and getting bitcoins from the faucet is considered a waste of time if you are expecting miracles from them.  instead of looking for free bitcoins, you should spend your time going to work, gaining knowledge, and looking for a job. that way, when you have money, you will get bitcoin faster by investing.

comments.body: No. We can't see it again this year or in the following years. Bitcoin has now increased very high, many times since it was launched and we can only follow the current price.Satoshi has succeeded in developing the Bitcoin project so that many people know it from various countries. This is a phenomenal discovery and we should be grateful to Satoshi Nakamoto. He has made a difference to many people.And Gavin has done what he can to help Satoshi Nakamoto make Bitcoin famous so that more people join and use Bitcoin to date. I only know Freebitco., which still provides free Bitcoin you can get once an hour. And it is also useful for people who want to know Bitcoin because they can still get the free satoshi. But they have to spend more time earning lots of satoshis.
